name: Kenneth McINTYRE & Similarly Situated Persons, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS & Robert D. Shannon, Superintendent, Appellees
name_abbreviation: McIntyre v. Pennsylvania Department of Corrections

parties: Kenneth McINTYRE & Similarly Situated Persons, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS & Robert D. Shannon, Superintendent, Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 23rd day of July, 2003, the above-captioned appeal is quashed for failure to file a brief.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
829 A.2d 297
Kenneth McINTYRE & Similarly Situated Persons, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS & Robert D. Shannon, Superintendent, Appellees.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
July 23, 2003.
